Articles.Content:
chat about the new elder scrolls game

https://video.search.yahoo.com/video/play;_ylt=AwrC5rK1pGRczkcAsD77w8QF;_ylu=X3oDMTByZ2N0cmxpBHNlYwNzcgRzbGsDdmlkBHZ0aWQDBGdwb3MDMg--?p=elder+scrolls+6+trailer&vid=3fb2a26ac262658daa5eeda5a4c0f21a&turl=https%3A%2F%2Ftse1.mm.bing.net%2Fth%3Fid%3DOVP.O4yZuJuc4P4qAQhqqFq_7gEsDh%26pid%3D15.1%26h%3D225%26w%3D300%26c%3D7%26rs%3D1&rurl=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.youtube.com%2Fwatch%3Fv%3DBQcnDNd3P7Q&bird=The+Elder+Scrolls+VI+-+Official+Announcement+Trailer+|+Bethesda+E3+2018&c=1&h=225&w=300&l=37&sigr=11b0b20h1&sigt=127c6p28g&sigi=12r3kgotg&age=1528685841&fr2=p%3As%2Cv%3Av&fr=mcafee&tt=b

just figures out it is in elsweyr, but i also noticed "Dovakhiin" was playing... there was a dude in a cage and a dragon as well...

its probably the dragonborn
I'm not really big on ES, but I have played Morrowind. I remember sitting in a house or something and getting attacked by rats.
personally i think morrowind was the best one, as far as the actual game.

Morrowind has its own atmosphere, imho the best of the ES.
If it had a Skyrim graphic...

Of course, there is Skywind, but it looks far from completion.
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Elder_Scrolls_Renewal_Project#Skywind

Though, the modded Skyrim is nice for a non-ES sandbox gameplay.

Edited February 23, 2019 by kerbiloid

New Elder Scrolls hmm?

Someone please tell me its not another multiplayer offering?

Some of us play games specifically to get away from humans.

28 minutes ago, p1t1o said:

Some of us play games specifically to get away from humans.

Exactly ! Morrowind and Oblivion were single player with a nice atmosphere, i find (yes, still sometimes) the former better than the latter. But if i can't buy it, download or get a copy and play without submitting to one of the data krakens, i won't play ...

yeah, cannot wait for the next elder scroll. heard it will be called redhead. not trustly though. i think skyrim is still much better than lots of the newly release games. like the way the world doesnot revolve around the main character
